(Simplified: 桢)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 貞 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 貞 [ zhēn ] virtuous, chaste, pure; loyal
①堅硬的木頭。
②古代打土牆時所立的木柱，泛指支柱：楨幹(gàn)(喻能勝重任的人)。
③古書上指女貞樹。
(Simplified: 桢)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 貞 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 桢

Original meaning 本义: Meaning hardwood or supports.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 楨木 zhēn mù (glossy privet)

楨字的基本解释

楨
zhēn
见“桢”。

楨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēn］
［《廣韻》陟盈切，平清，知。］
“桢1”的繁体字。
(1)木名。即女贞。
(2)筑墙时竖在两端的木柱。
(3)支柱，主干。
(4)见“楨子”。

楨字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楨； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页540第22
【唐韻】陟盈切【集韻】【韻會】知盈切【正韻】諸成切，?音貞。【說文】剛木也。【山海經】太山之上多楨木。【郭註】女楨也。冬不凋。　又楨榦，築牆所立兩木也。【書·費誓】峙乃楨榦。【孔傳】題曰楨，旁曰榦。楨當牆兩端者也，榦在牆兩邊者也。　又楨林，縣名。【前漢·地理志】屬上郡。

考證：〔【山海經】太山之上多楨女。〕　謹照原文楨女改楨木。
楨字的源字形

字源演变：

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhēn］
["Guang Yun" Zhi Ying cut, calm and clear. ]
Traditional characters for "桢1".
(1) Wooden name. That is privet.
(2) The wooden pillars erected at both ends when building the wall.
(3) Pillar, backbone.
(4) See "Zhenzi".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桢; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 540 22
[Tang Yun] Zhiying Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhiying Cut [Zheng Yun] Zhu Chengqi,? Yinzhen. [Said the text] Gangmu also. [Shanhaijing] There are many frame woods on the Taishan Mountain. [Guo's Note] Female Zhen is also. Winter does not wither.　It's dry again, and two woods are erected on the wall. [Book·Fei Oath] Zhi is a true master. [Kong Chuan] The title is Zhen, and the side is dry. Those who are on both sides of the wall are also those who are dry on both sides of the wall.　You Zhenlin, the name of the county. [Former Han Geography] belongs to Shangjun. Textual research: [[Shanhaijing] There are many women on the Taishan Mountain. 〕　I would like to change the original 桢女 to 桢木.
